title: Thunderbird not saving edits to address book
content: I went through all the trouble of adding everyone's address and phone in my Address Book and saved each one and went back later and none of the addresses or phone numbers were there. Simply didn't save. Not going to re-enter until I can figure it out!
creator: JanSw

title: Change double spacing of the email display
content:
When I open Thunderbird all the emails are listed BUT they are double spaced. This is not the spacing of an email response, just the way they are displayed when TB is opened. I'm sure it is a simple mouse click selection but it eludes me. Can anyone suggest the choice? There are two computers and one of them displays exactly they way wanted. The other one show each email double spaced before opening it. The attached image is the display I want. Thanks for any help.

Larry Kamberg ldkamb@frontier.com
creator: ldkamb
